name: Stick Princess Escape
description:
**PLEASE ENABLE FULLSCREEN TO PLAY**

Publisher's Notes -  I learned A lot from this Game Jam! ( XanderJam#2) I learned all the things i need to improve on as a developer. I had given up from  this game, until the last day, where i decided to go and finish it. there are tons of things missing, and if you die there is no respawn, so play cautiously. and there is only 1 level, and thanks for playing my game!

HOW TO PLAY:

MOVE: ARROW KEYS

ATTACK: SPACE BAR

Entry for XanderJam#2 - Winter Jam
